issue.title: [CF 704] SpellDamageTaken doesn't include soulburn:CoE, or aura of the elements
issue.body:
TMW r661 still doesn't include all the auras for the spell dmg debuff.  Or for some other reason SpellDamageTaken doesn't match rogue Master Poisoner, soulburn CoE, or Aura of the Elements.  I didn't test hunter pet debuffs.  Curse of the Elements itself does work.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S116202;~`104225;~`SpellDamageTaken ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N61006^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Karsteck | Imported from CurseForge issue #704 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be fixed in r664

Edited Nov 22, 2012
